alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 7:13PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 800 PM EST... At 712 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout over Riverside, or near Arlington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Mayport, Ortega, Talbot Island, Craig Field, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline, San Marco and Riverside. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
